thread.title: Jayam Ravi Arvind Swamy Bogan collects 18 crores box office verdict is Average - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Jayam Ravi Arvind Swamy Bogan collects 18 crores box office verdict is Average - Tamil Movie News

title: Jayam Ravi Arvind Swamy Bogan collects 18 crores box office verdict is Average - Tamil Movie News
text: Jayam Ravi's, 'Bogan' which has completed three weeks at Chennai Box office has collected Rs.11,27,810 in its third weekend with 80% occupancy. The overall collections of the Lakshman directed film since its release on February 2, 2016 stands at Rs.2,96,41,730. The total collections from the Tamil Nadu state has touched Rs.18 crores. With this the film had to settled for a Average verdict apparently due to high prices to distributors and exhibitors. It is to be noted that he film acquired positive reviews from critics as well as audience and took a tremendous opening.
